DOC.brief_summary: To identify Maximum Tolerated Dose level LEO 43204 daily treatment two consecutive day evaluate efficacy LEO 43204 two dos daily treatment two consecutive day compare vehicle
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Doses LEO 43204 Once Daily Two Consecutive Days Full Balding Scalp Subjects With Actinic Keratosis
DOC.criteria: Part 1 : Subjects 5 20 clinically typical , visible discrete AKs full balding scalp .
